column4: anyone? I can't see the time and can't add it.. this is weird
you have a bar without the time/date thing?
I don't think so.. this is unity proper if I'm not mistaken.
got the ?????? thing on the left? what is it called?

I can't tell you how to perhaps return the date, but I am not sure it's a fix, open a terminal and type 'unity-2d-panel'  , if nothing gets clobbered you should have date/time where you would expect it, you can log out and back in afterwards to undo it
ok, running that now.. it's just sitting there (complaining about other client alreadying reserving hotkeys it wants to use)
I'm really getting annoyed with Ubuntu now.. ever since Unity.
I'm okay with the panel.. I'm okay with the dash and all that other stuff
I'm not against the concepts at all.. but jesus man.. let it be configurable.. or actually work.
I use gnome with cairo dock, I gave up on trying to fix this and that,
It appears to be more stable now in 11.10 but this date thing is annoying
